long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate random GUIDs.

For added randomness, when you are online, an online random number generator will be used to provide much better entropy.

Uses random.jquery.js https://github.com/chrisalexander/random.jquery.js

The default keyboard shortcut to launch the app is Ctrl+Shift+G (Cmd+Shift+G on Mac)
